SEARCH

Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
The Reservation class defines a reservation and its corresponding details.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Reservation(Date checkIn, Date checkOut, double reservedPrice, Guest guest)
    Constructor that creates a Reservation instance.
    Reservation(Date checkIn, Date checkOut, double reservedPrice, ArrayList<Guest> guestList)
    Secondary constructor that creates a Reservation instance that contains multiple guests.

  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(Date checkIn, Date checkOut, double reservedPrice, Guest guest)
      Constructor that creates a Reservation instance.
      Parameters:
      checkIn - Date object describing the check in time.
      checkOut - Date object describing the check out time.
      reservedPrice - Price of the reservation per night.
      guest - Guest object that is reserving the room.

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(Date checkIn, Date checkOut, double reservedPrice, ArrayList<Guest> guestList)
      Secondary constructor that creates a Reservation instance that contains multiple guests.
      Parameters:
      checkIn - Date object describing the check in time.
      checkOut - Date object describing the check out time.
      reservedPrice - Price of the reservation per night.
      guestList - ArrayList of Guest objects that are reserving the room together.

  • Method Details

    • calculateTotalPrice

      public double calculateTotalPrice(Date checkIn, Date checkOut)
      Calculates the total price of the booking
      Parameters:
      checkIn - Date object describing the check in time.
      checkOut - Date object describing the check out time.
      Returns:
      Total price of the booking.

    • addGuest

      public void addGuest(Guest guest)
      Adds a guest to the Reservation instance via the guestList.
      Parameters:
      guest - Guest object to be added in the reservation.

    • removeGuest

      public boolean removeGuest(String first, String last)
      Attempts to remove a guest from the reservation by their names.
      Parameters:
      first - firstName String key that the Guest list will try to find and remove.
      last - lastName String key that the Guest list will try to find and remove.
      Returns:
      True if guest was successfully removed from the list, false if there is no match.

    • getReservedPrice

      public double getReservedPrice()
      Gets the price per night.
      Returns:
      Price per night.

    • getTotalPrice

      public double getTotalPrice()
      Gets the total price for the booking.
      Returns:
      Total price.

    • getFormattedTotalPrice

      public String getFormattedTotalPrice()
      Gets the total price as a formatted String (real number with 2 decimal places) for the Reservation.
      Returns:
      Total price as a String.

    • getGuests

      public ArrayList<Guest> getGuests()
      Gets the guest list that is linked to the reservation.
      Returns:
      Guest list as an ArrayList.

    • getCheckIn

      public Date getCheckIn()
      Gets the check in time.
      Returns:
      Date object representing the check in time.

    • getCheckOut

      public Date getCheckOut()
      Gets the check out time.
      Returns:
      Date object representing the check out time.
